title: The Garden Maze
description: Three stories from Stephanie Park, showcasing three more colourful worlds. Firstly The Garden Maze tells the story of an unwilling and unlikely heroine making her way through a dangerous labyrinth after being tasked by a prophet, a prophetess, and a child to save the Earth.In The Son of the Cat, a son struggles to gain his father’s approval. A dismal mage and showing no sign of the cat-like abilities unique to his family, Ashen knows that he will never win the approval of his father. Just when he thinks his life couldn’t get worse, he is kidnapped by pirates and sold into slavery.The final story, ‘For the Love of Perfection’, a young, nameless unicorn goes on a long quest to find a dragon who had become captivated by her at a chance encounter.
author: Stephanie Park
